cat << 'ENDOFFILE' > train_and_predict.py
import pandas as pd
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.preprocessing import StandardScaler
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestClassifier

# Load data
train_df = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test_df = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Feature engineering
def preprocess_data(df):
    df['Age'].fillna(df['Age'].median(), inplace=True)
    df.drop(['Cabin', 'Ticket'], axis=1, inplace=True)
    df['FamilySize'] = df['SibSp'] + df['Parch'] + 1
    df['IsAlone'] = df['FamilySize'] == 1
    df['Title'] = df['Name'].str.extract(r',\s([A-Za-z]+)\.')
    title_mapping = {
        'Mr': 1, 'Miss': 2, 'Mrs': 3, 'Master': 4,
        'Dr': 5, 'Rev': 6, 'Col': 7, 'Major': 8, 'Sir': 9,
        'Jonkheer': 10, 'Lady': 11, 'Countess': 12, 'Don': 13, 'Capt': 14,
        'Ms': 15, 'Dona': 16
    }
    df['Title'] = df['Title'].map(title_mapping)
    df.drop(['Name'], axis=1, inplace=True)
    df['Embarked'].fillna(df['Embarked'].mode()[0], inplace=True)
    df['Sex'] = df['Sex'].map({'male': 0, 'female': 1})
    return df

train_df = preprocess_data(train_df)
test_df = preprocess_data(test_df)

# Split features and target
X = train_df.drop(columns=['PassengerId', 'Survived'])
y = train_df['Survived']

# Scale features
scaler = StandardScaler()
X_scaled = scaler.fit_transform(X)

# Split data into training and validation sets
X_train, X_val, y_train, y_val = train_test_split(X_scaled, y, test_size=0.2, random_state=42)

# Train model
model = RandomForestClassifier(n_estimators=100, random_state=42)
model.fit(X_train, y_train)

# Predict on validation set
val_predictions = model.predict(X_val)

# Evaluate model
accuracy = (val_predictions == y_val).mean()
print(f'Validation Accuracy: {accuracy}')

# Predict on test set
test_df.drop(columns=['PassengerId'], inplace=True)
test_df_scaled = scaler.transform(preprocess_data(test_df))
predictions = model.predict(test_df_scaled)

# Save predictions
submission = pd.Data
